bug.short_desc: Docu bug: Inconsistent links to W3C Event Spec

long_desc.thetext:
Both class docs and wiki link to W3C pages related to the event interface. But these links are inconsistent and sometimes broken:
class doc qx.event.type.KeyInput: http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-3-Events/events.html#Events-KeyboardEvent [broken]
class doc qx.event.type.KeySequence: http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-3-Events/events.html#Events-KeyboardEvent [same, broken]
method doc qx.event.type.KeySequence#getKeyIdentifier():
http://www.w3.org/TR/2003/NOTE-DOM-Level-3-Events-20031107/events.html#Events-KeyboardEvent-keyIdentifier [ok]
wiki event page http://qooxdoo.org/documentation/0.8/event_layer_impl: http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-2-Events/events.html#Events-interface [ok]
As you can see, there is also a mix between DOM-Level-2 and DOM-Level-3 links.

See comment in #2196
The mix is correct.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 2196 ***
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
